name: B. Fun with Even Subarrays
statement:
You are given an array a of n elements. You can apply the following
operation to it any number of times: Select some subarray from a of even
size 2k that begins at position l (1
le l
le l+2
cdot{k}-1
le n, k
ge 1) and for each i between 0 and k-1 (inclusive), assign the value
a_{l+k+i} to a_{l+i}. For example, if a = [2, 1, 3, 4, 5, 3], then
choose l = 1 and k = 2, applying this operation the array will become a
= [3, 4, 3, 4, 5, 3].Find the minimum number of operations (possibly
zero) needed to make all the elements of the array equal.
